archive_info.archive_reason: Lower relevance score compared to TOP 10 selected papers (still highly relevant but not prioritized)
archive_info.note: These papers are still highly relevant to supply chain security for KMS but ranked 11-20

archived_papers.title: Cisco Integrated AI Security and Safety Framework Report
archived_papers.relevance: HIGH - Model/data integrity, supply chain tampering in AI systems
archived_papers.abstract_summary: Addresses threats spanning model and data integrity compromise (e.g., poisoning, supply-chain tampering) alongside runtime manipulations and ecosystem risks in AI systems

archived_papers.title: Unlocking Reproducibility: Automating re-Build Process for Open-Source Software
archived_papers.relevance: VERY HIGH - Binary-source verification, artifact rebuilding, CI/CD transparency
archived_papers.abstract_summary: Automated Maven artifact rebuilding from source to verify binary-source correspondence. Found 84% of top 1200 commonly used artifacts not built using transparent CI/CD pipelines

archived_papers.title: A Reality Check on SBOM-based Vulnerability Management: An Empirical Study and A Path Forward
archived_papers.relevance: VERY HIGH - 97.5% false positive rate in vulnerability scanning, SBOM reality check
archived_papers.abstract_summary: Large-scale study on 2,414 repositories exposing a staggering 97.5% false positive rate in vulnerability scanning and demonstrating function call analysis effectiveness

archived_papers.title: AI Bill of Materials and Beyond: Systematizing Security Assurance through the AI Risk Scanning (AIRS) Framework
archived_papers.relevance: VERY HIGH - AI-BOM, model integrity, packaging safety, runtime behaviors
archived_papers.abstract_summary: Evidence-generating framework for AI model security verification. Produces structured artifacts capturing model integrity, packaging safety, and runtime behaviors

archived_papers.title: Attestable Builds: Compiling Verifiable Binaries on Untrusted Systems using Trusted Execution Environments
archived_papers.relevance: VERY HIGH - TEE-based verification, source-to-binary verification
archived_papers.abstract_summary: TEE-based mechanism for source-to-binary verification. Offers nearly instantaneous verification of correspondence between binary and source code

archived_papers.title: Bomfather: An eBPF-based Kernel-level Monitoring Framework for Accurate Identification of Unknown, Unused, and Dynamically Loaded Dependencies
archived_papers.relevance: VERY HIGH - Kernel-level dependency tracking, dynamic dependencies, SBOM accuracy
archived_papers.abstract_summary: Kernel-level framework capturing software build dependencies transparently in real time accounting for conditional compilation, dead-code, selective library usage, and dynamic dependencies

archived_papers.title: Towards Robust Detection of Open Source Software Supply Chain Poisoning Attacks in Industry Environments
archived_papers.relevance: VERY HIGH - OSCAR tool for detecting supply chain poisoning in NPM/PyPI
archived_papers.abstract_summary: Presents OSCAR, a detection tool addressing the exponential growth of open-source package ecosystems vulnerabilities in NPM and PyPI. Field deployment identified 10,404 malicious NPM packages and 1,235 malicious PyPI packages over 18 months

archived_papers.title: SBOMproof: Beyond Alleged SBOM Compliance for Supply Chain Security of Container Images
archived_papers.relevance: VERY HIGH - SBOM confusion vulnerability, format inconsistencies, container security
archived_papers.abstract_summary: Comprehensive tool evaluation revealing the SBOM confusion vulnerability where inconsistent formats prevent reliable vulnerability detection across tools

archived_papers.title: VeriGuard: Enhancing LLM Agent Safety via Verified Code Generation
archived_papers.relevance: HIGH - Formal verification, policy enforcement, safety guarantees for LLM agents
archived_papers.abstract_summary: Addresses safety enforcement for autonomous agents through formal verification. VeriGuard provides formal safety guarantees through a dual-stage architecture combining offline policy verification with online runtime monitoring

archived_papers.title: Generating Mitigations for Downstream Projects to Neutralize Upstream Library Vulnerability
archived_papers.relevance: VERY HIGH - Vulnerability mitigation, dependency security, LUMEN tool
archived_papers.abstract_summary: Tackles vulnerability mitigation when dependency upgrades are infeasible or source code unavailable. LUMEN successfully mitigated 70.2% of impacted functions across 40 vulnerabilities without losing functionality
